author: philngo
content: <@881905303011086387> , during our team standup today, we did have enough interest to justify having some sort of an informal discovery/breakout call on this document which we'd like to also open up to other interested parties. There is some interest in understanding the benefits and requirements for some of this stuff, especially the slashing component as we _think_ a lot of hesitancy in using this part of the protocol is due to the low security assurances. Ideally before next ACDC if you can participate . Thinking about March 6 @ 1400 UTC.

author: etan_status
content: sure, do you want to open this up for others as well? <@552133098075193354> could create a breakout call for light clients, the time is fine for me

author: philngo
content: Some guys from Lodestar will be there, and anybody else who follows this channel and went through your doc

author: uink45
content: Hey <@578356786889752586>, I would be keen on attending the call as well. That time is also fine.
